questions.question_text: To create a non-root token with time-to-live (TTL) set to 30 minutes but with no max TTL which flag would you use?

discussion.content:
A ( -ttl=30m)

The answer B can be misleading, but first we would not define the TTL of 30 minutes, and it should be noted that if the max-ttl flag is specified it automatically defines it as explicit_max_ttl = 0s, therefore it is not necessary to define

Selected Answer: A
Assuming the "n" is a typo and should be "m" for minutes A is correct.
https://developer.hashicorp.com/vault/docs/concepts/duration-format#m

questions.question_text:
A user successfully logs into Vault with the following cURL command: curl --request POST --data @payload.json http://127.0.0.1:8200/v1/auth/ldap/login/mitchellh
The response will include what information?

discussion.content:
B
Is the only option that NO meet with the requirement 

(Which command does not meet this requirement?)

questions.question_text: Security requirements demand that no secrets appear in the shell history. Which command does not meet this requirement?

choices.A: generate-password | vault kv put secret/password value=-

choices.D: Gives a super admin permissions, similar to a root user on a Linux machine
choices.B: Provides a common set of permissions and is included on all tokens by default
choices.E: Vault upgrade will overwrite any update you made to the default policy
choices.A: It is one of the built-in policies
choices.C: Can not be modified or deleted

questions.question_text: Which of the following statements are true about the default policy? (Choose two.)

choices.B: To get around cloud license limitations
choices.D: To allow the same application in one cloud to access already provisioned Vault tokens for that application in another cloud
choices.C: To allow an application deployed with multiple authentication methods have a consistent set of policies
choices.A: To prohibit Vault administrators from revoking tokens associated with that application

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
C is one of the uses of entities as outlined here https://developer.hashicorp.com/vault/docs/concepts/identity#entities-and-aliases

questions.question_text: Why might an application be mapped to an identity entity?
